subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wiggins of Britain won the Giro d’Italia’s opening leg, edging the world champion Cadel Evans and the American Brent Bookwalter by two seconds.
snippet: Bradley Wiggins of Britain won the Giro d’Italia’s opening leg, edging the world champion Cadel Evans and the American Brent Bookwalter by two seconds.
